text: (malayikavarun men) kavurun niyata vasayenma obage deviyan veta sitinnoda, ovun ohuva næmadimehi degidiyavak dakvanne næta. ehet (‘oba itamat parisuddhavantayeki, oba itamat parisuddhavantayeki’ yayi) ohuva (sæmavitama) suvisuddha karaminda, ohuta hisa nava sujud karamin (namadimin)da sitinnaha
